dataFile <- read.csv2(file.choose(), header=T)
attach(dataFile)
names(dataFile)
hist(Price,col="lightblue", xlim=c(320, 950),freq=FALSE)
hist(Score,col="lightgreen", xlim=c(50, 90),freq=FALSE)
hist(Time, col="pink", xlim=c(70, 115),freq=FALSE)
plot(Price,Score)
cor(Price,Score)
plot(Price,Time)
cor(Price,Time)
plot(Price,Elect)
cor(Price,Elect)
plot(Price,Gas)
cor(Price,Gas)
plot(Price,Water)
cor(Price,Water)
plot(Score,Elect)
cor(Score,Elect)
plot(Score,Gas)
cor(Score,Gas)
plot(Score,Time)
cor(Score,Time)
plot(Score,Water)
cor(Score,Water)
plot(Elect,Gas)
cor(Elect,Gas)
plot(Elect,Time)
cor(Elect,Time)

cor(Elect,Water)
plot(Gas,Time)
